statements: DELETE FROM labeled_training_data WHERE label = 'Positive' AND id > 5;
DELETE FROM labeled_training_data WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM labeled_training_data WHERE label = 'Neutral') AND id < 10;
DELETE FROM labeled_training_data WHERE label = 'spam' AND id IN (SELECT id FROM labeled_training_data WHERE features ->> 'type' = 'email');
DELETE FROM machine_learning_models WHERE model_name = 'Decision Tree' AND model_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8'
DELETE FROM model_training_history WHERE model_id = 3 AND epoch > 5;
